import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../Navbar' import {Formik, Form} from 'formik' import {connect} from "react-redux"; import './Addpage.css' import {editProfile} from '../../actioncreators/Home' import {addLike} from "../..//actioncreators/Home" import {useForm} from "react-hook-form" import Axios from 'axios'; const edit = (props) => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors, formState } = useForm(); const url = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL const onSubmit = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")) const id = user.id Axios.put(`${url}/users/edit/${id}`) } return (

want to change your style

) } const mapDispatchToProps = { editProfile: editProfile, addLike: addLike } export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(edit)
